alert.note: Alert for Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 3:21PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Leon County through 345 PM EDT... At 320 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tallahassee, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Ralford Greenway, Macon Community Park, Lake Iamonia, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Maclay State Gardens, Killearn Lakes, Iamonia, Moccasin Gap, Killearn Estates, Fallschase, Lake Ella, Bradfordville, Winthrop Park, Tom Brown Park, Forest Meadows Park, Pisgah Church and Tallahassee Mall. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
